name: CPBarButton
desc: A button for placement in a navigation bar.

items.name: init(image: UIImage, handler: CPBarButtonHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a bar button that displays an image.

items.name: init(title: String, handler: CPBarButtonHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a bar button that displays a text label.

items.name: typealias CPBarButtonHandler
items.desc: A block that CarPlay calls when the user taps a bar button.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that enables and disables the bar button.

items.name: var image: UIImage?
items.desc: The image displayed on the bar button.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The title displayed on the bar button.

items.name: var buttonStyle: CPBarButtonStyle
items.desc: The style to use when displaying the button.

items.name: enum CPBarButtonStyle
items.desc: The display style of a bar button.
